text:
E la Carte (www.elacarte.com) Palo Alto, CA We develop tablets for restaurants that allow guests to browse the entire menu with pictures, place orders, and pay their check whenever they want - without having to leave their seats!

Openings: Backend & Frontend Software Engineers and a Sales Coordinator

Stack: Python, Django, JavaScript, HTML5, tablets, 3rd party POS integration, web

More info: www.elacarte.com/jobs

Or feel free to ping me at megan (at) elacarte.com
